<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1931</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">News throughout the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachrichten weltweit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelles dans le monde entier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notícia durante todo o mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notizie nel mondo intero</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ειδήσεις σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noticias a través del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An online internet activity for English students, where the students compare a current event as it appears in different newspapes throughout the world. THe sudents are also asked to write their own news report on the same event.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current events</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">newspapers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">journalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Internet-Online-Dienst für englische 
Kursteilnehmer, in denen die Kursteilnehmer einen aktuellen Fall 
vergleichen, während er in den unterschiedlichen newspapes weltweit 
erscheint. Die sudents werden auch gebeten, ihren eigenen 
Nachrichtenreport auf den gleichen Fall zu schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une activité en ligne d'Internet pour les 
étudiants anglais, où les étudiants comparent un événement actuel
pendant qu'il apparaît dans différents newspapes dans le monde 
entier. Les sudents sont également invités à écrire leur 
propre état de nouvelles sur le même événement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atividade em linha do Internet para os 
estudantes ingleses, onde os estudantes comparam um evento atual 
enquanto aparece em newspapes diferentes durante todo o mundo. 
Os sudents são pedidos também para escrever seu próprio 
relatório de notícia no mesmo evento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'attività in linea del Internet per gli 
allievi inglesi, in cui gli allievi confrontano un evento corrente 
mentre compare nei newspapes differenti nel mondo intero. I 
sudents egualmente sono chiesti di scrivere il loro proprio rapporto 
di notizie sullo stesso evento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητα Διαδικτύου για 
τους αγγλικούς σπουδαστές, όπου οι σπουδαστές συγκρίνουν ένα 
παρόν γεγονός όπως εμφανίζεται στα διαφορετικά newspapes σε 
όλο τον κόσμο. Τα THe sudents καλούνται επίσης να 
γράψουν οι ειδήσεις ότι τους υποβάλλουν έκθεση σχετικά με το 
ίδιο γεγονός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una actividad en línea del Internet para los 
estudiantes ingleses, donde los estudiantes comparan un suceso actual 
mientras que aparece en diversos newspapes a través del mundo. 
Los sudents también se piden escribir su propio informe de 
noticias en el mismo acontecimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuelle Fälle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Journalismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">événements actuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">journaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">journalisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
